text: A wingtip is a part of a plane that is most distant from the fuselage of a fixed-wing aircraft. Because the wingtip shape influences the size and drag of the wingtip vortices, the tip size has produced a diversity of shapes and sizes. Those are: Squared-off Aluminium tube blow Horner style Winglets Drooped tips Raked wingtips Tip tanks Sails Fences End plates
title: Wingtip
